Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~smithbk Do you want to target this fix for fabric-samples 1.1? I'm ok with that if you think risk is low.

Action.author: smithbk
Action.body: Since this only happens when customizing the sample in a particular way, I don't think it is needed for v1.1. And also want to make sure that other customizations don't issues also.
